title: Towards a Metapsychology that is true to Transformation w/ Gregg Henriques and Zachary Stein
description:
In this six part series I am joined by Gregg  Henriques and Zachery Stein as we work towards generating a metapsychology that integrates the multiple domains of psychology as well as integrates psychology with cognitive science and philosophy in order to properly and deeply account for the human capacity for transformation. We also explore how this deep appreciation of transformation has significant implications for education and our understanding of human spirituality.  This series is a follow up to two earlier series, Untangling the Worldknot of Consciousness,  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bD6Szbf1cHo&t=91s ,  and The Elusive I:  The Nature and Function of the Self, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Fnmp6UVafM&t=647s ,  but it can also be watched as a stand alone series.

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
